evaluate

public java.util.ArrayList<Tuple> evaluate(Tuple tuple,
                                           int leftPos,
                                           SteM curSteM,
                                           Catalog catalog)
Perform the join evaluation.

Parameters:
tuple - the current processed tuple.
leftPos - the position of the attribute the join is performed on.
curSteM - the SteM in which the processed tuple is probed for matches.
catalog - the catalog of the system.
Returns:
The list of the matches found in the SteM.
